Bayesian Multilevel Modeling Preface 0.1 Thesis Related Stuff

Bayesian Multilevel Modeling Alexander Knudson 2020-04-19 Preface In this collection, I will be building a narrative around general linear models as I take an experiment in psychometrics and perform a complete analysis from the ground up. 0.1 Thesis Related Stuff Theorem 1 (Name of the Theorem) If a model is hierarchical, then it is multilevel. Remark. This is really more of a tautology then a theorem. Corollary 1 If a model is multilevel, then it is hierarchical.
